short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch Podium easily from your favourite apps and websites to instantly connect with customers via text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Podium Pass installed, the extension quickly scans apps and websites for mobile and phone numbers. When it finds a number, the Podium icon appears. You can then use various actions to text, call, or send a payment link to your customers. Additionally, you can highlight and right-click the number to jump directly to your Podium inbox.

Podium Pass helps you:

- Save time by moving conversations from your web browser to Podium in just one click.

- Convert leads faster and boost revenue by bringing more contacts and conversations into Podium.

- Save money on costly CRM texting with unlimited one-to-one messaging at a fraction of the cost.

- Initiate phone calls with a single click, with numbers automatically pre-populated in Podium for quick dialing using Podium Phones.

- Collect payments effortlessly by hovering over the Podium icon and clicking the payments button. Youâ€™ll be taken to Podium Payments to complete the request.

For times when you prefer fewer interruptions, simply disable Podium Pass on selected websites through the extension settings. Easy!

Note: This extension is currently in beta. A Podium account and the Chrome browser are required to use this extension.

Not a Podium customer? Book a demo or sign up at www.podium.com.
